Team

  •

    Tor-Morten Grønli, Ph.D. CS

    Head of Mobile Tech Lab (MOTEL), Dean Faculty of Technology

    Tor-Morten is interested in mobile, ubiquitous and pervasive computing.

  •

    Siri Fagernes, Assistant Professor

    Researcher at Faculty of Technology

    Siri is interested in Human-Computer Interaction, distributed systems and information architecture.

  •

    Kjeld Steenbjerg Hansen, Ph.D. fellow

    Researcher at Faculty of Technology

    Kjeld is interested in the interplay between social media, mobile computing and information management in relation to public health and cities.

  •

    Andreas Biørn-Hansen, Ph.D. fellow

    Researcher at Faculty of Technology

    Andreas is interested in cross-platform development, the mobile web and emerging mobile technologies.

  •

    Anders Mikkelsen, MSc

    Master's of Applied Computer Science candidate at Faculty of Technology

    Anders is interested in distributed systems, mobile integrations, microservices and systems architecture.

  •

    Ravi Vatrapu, Ph.D. IS

    Visiting researcher and lecturer at Faculty of Technology

    Ravi is interested in computational social science and big data.

  •

    Raghava Rao Mukkamala, Ph.D. CS

    External collaborator

    Raghava is interested in computational social science and social media.

  •

    George Ghinea, Ph.D.

    Visiting researcher and lecturer at Faculty of Technology

    George is interested in eye-tracking, telemedicine, multi-modal interaction, and ubiquitous and mobile computing.
